attributes.action: Change the law regarding carbon monoxide alarms.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Approx 50 people die in the UK and many hundreds if not thousands are affected by carbon monoxide poisoning every year.
We would like the law changed to ensure that any new housing must be fitted with audible carbon monoxide alarms.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Change the law regarding carbon monoxide alarms."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page20202
